authors: Contributors to Less Than Jake Wiki
data.meta_description: Triple Crown Records is a New York-based record label. It is home to Folly, The Receiving End of Sirens, The Dear Hunter, and As Tall as Lions, among others. It also helped launch Brand New and Hot Rod Circuit. Triple Crown Records is a part of the East West family of record labels, a subsidiary...
data.text:
Triple Crown Records is a New York-based record label. It is home to Folly, The Receiving End of Sirens, The Dear Hunter, and As Tall as Lions, among others. It also helped launch Brand New and Hot Rod Circuit.

Triple Crown Records is a part of the East West family of record labels, a subsidiary of Warner Music Group.

As Tall as Lions

Hit The Lights

The Dear Hunter

Fight Fair

The Secret Handshake

The Gay Blades

Fireworks
